description: Version 1.2 introduces a new game mode, including new platforms! --- How far can you climb? With good balance and timing you will reach great heights in SuperJump. Control the little smiley by tilting your device left and right, jump on the platforms to climb up. Use the coil springs to your advantage, but be careful with moving, breaking, sloped or loose platforms and other surprises you will encounter on your way up! By collecting two stars, you can do a super jump which will help you to leave the ground behind you. Show the world in the online leaderboard who can climb highest! --- Update 1.1 makes the game run on the Pixi. With version 1.1.2, the accelerometer can be calibrated in the settings. Version 1.2 introduces the tricky mode - good luck!
